channel.title: Custom items
channel.description: I wanna put some custom items like ,wings but there is a problem i've seen some tutorials to add custom items to you're server but if i wanna search a file named:class8.java Because i didnt found it i downloaded a other server but no class8.java the rsps that i used where:XENON 525,Deathlypvpz v3 please can someone help me with this because i wanna add some cool stuff to my server

item.title: Custom items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The tutorials you were looking at were for older, non-renamed clients.
Class8.java is the ItemDef class in the client.
In newer clients, they’ve renamed the file to “ItemDef.java” or something similar.
(This only applies to the 317 client, I’m unsure how anything above it works)

You will have to rename the variables and etc to match the format of your client.

Read full topic
